name: PGA Tour Golf
overview: The only game to make the PGA Tour cut. It's all here: The long drives, pressure putts, challenging courses, and world class competition of the PGA TOUR. All new Super NES Mode 7 scaling and rotation. Perfect models of the world's greatest courses. Compete on the TPC's at Sawgrass, Avenel, Eagle Trace, and the PGA West Stadium Course. Battery backup saves your tournaments, players, prize money and performance stats such as driving distance, par breakers, and scoring average.
